value.title: Dense Rank Function in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk about how we can apply Dense Rank in Power BI. Power BI provide a functionality to create Rank using DAX expression. We will use RANKX() function to create a Rank in Power BI.  Download Link of Sample https://github.com/Dhruvinshah16/Power-BI/tree/master/PBI-DenseRankSample
